TEXT.TITLE: SKY EXPRESS <SKYX> PRESIDENT PLEADS GUILTY
TEXT.BODY: Sky Express Inc said its president and chief operating officer, John Cerrito Sr, pleaded guilty to one charge of evading his personal income taxes in 1983. The company said a sentencing date has not yet been set. Reuter
